review: Consulted Dr Datta for chronic pain around my shoulder..Was not resolving in spite of multiple consultation with other doctors.But I am grossly benefitted after visiting Dr Datta and his medicines has worked like magic for me..I am relieved of pain and can move my arms freely.Thank You doctor for being empathetic and effective.

context: Loose Motion,Numbness and tingling,Diabetes Treatment,Throat infection,Liver abscess,
review: Visited him quite a few times, he never failed to provide me with the perfect solutions to my health issues. I would definitely recommend anyone to take a visit to him regarding any issues and get treated!
He is not only efficient but also warm and has the ability to take away your worries while treating you. You can find answers for your health problems from him.
* **** **** ******* Takes immediate proper action regarding the disease. He is trustworthy. Gives priority to patient's problem.
He is a very friendly doctor,listens to all the problems very minutely & provides effective solutions.
